about_the_game:
Solve mind-bending puzzles where creativity will serve you at least as well as logic. Find unique interactions in an environment that will continue to defy your expectations and the normal laws of physics.

Product Features

  • Break the laws of physics
    Influence objects by changing their size, shape, and even their purpose.
  • Spatial puzzles based on distortion of space
    Distort space, discover new interactions, and solve your way through this mind-bending series of challenging puzzles.
  • Original music
    Alas, but human.
  • Ordinary human plot
    Embark on a quest…an ordinary human quest…a quest for ordinary humans…an ordinary quest for extraordinary humans.
  • Comedic timing is difficult to convey through text…
    See? Nothing funny in this part of the line……Not here either. Maybe it needs more dots………………….? Still not funny? Okay, well maybe just play Ordinary Human Game instead.

name: Ordinary Human Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 (DX10, DX11, DX12 capable)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Ordinary Human Game is a first-person physics-based puzzler with distinctly non-traditional physical laws that you have to figure out. Interact with “ordinary” objects and discover the purpose of this not so ordinary world! Something is clearly wrong here!
